titleStmt.title: The true light shining in England, to give unto all her inhabitants the knowledge of their ways wherein they may behold things past, and things that are, and thereby come to repentance, and escape that which is to come : also, something demonstrated concerning the people of God (called Quakers) as to their principle and practice ... / William Smith.
titleStmt.author: Smith, William, d. 1673.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
